name: Frutin
description:
Frutin is a retro platformer game where you try to save everyone from king of the clouds. You play as Frutin, a small character, in a large world only wanting your friends back. Adventure through many areas, and many tricky harsh terrains to save all of your everyone from this disaster.

This game was made for the Retrograde Game Jam 2. This game uses the EDG16 color palette and a Gameboy resolution for the visuals, as well as some retro music. I hope that you enjoy playing.

Note: sorry for having to release this game as a development build instead of an actual one. Click one clear, or close, to ignore the errors that you might while playing this.
